name: Youda Survivor
summary:
“Trust your survival instincts.”  
  
Survive like a real Robinson Crusoe after stranding on the funniest and most mysterious island! Depend on some basic tools and the local wildlife to survive.  
  
Find out how to escape this island while you fight off angry pirates and work together with an exotic native tribe under the scorching sun.  
  
Mystical tribal items, weather-controlling rituals and special machines help you advance in your quest to explore the island and eventually reach the main land.  
  
Prove that you have what it takes to survive anywhere and under any circumstance.
